GSD.description:
xtensa: Fix refcount leak bug in time.c

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.321 by commit 3e5eb904d9ba657308fc75a5de434b0e58dcb8d7. For more details please see the references link.
